definition[0]: used to make a suggestion about what to do
example[0]: No, I’m busy on Monday. How about Tuesday at seven?
example[1]: How about we have that game when we get back?
example[2]: How about if we tell the police where Newley is hiding?
example[3]: How’s about going to the beach this afternoon?
example[4]: How about putting the sofa closer to the window?
definition[1]: used to ask about another person or thing
example[5]: ‘Mary and Ken are still away.’ ‘And how about Billy?’
example[6]: I need a long cold drink. How about you?
